titles.title: Mäṣḥafä ʾardǝʾǝt “Book of the Disciples” / Miscellaneous hymns and prayers / Mäṣḥafä mälaʾǝkt “Book of the Angels” / Sǝmʿu wä-lǝbbǝw ʾo-däqiqä ʾAdam “Listen and understand O children of Adam...” / Gädlä ʾAbrǝham “Vita of Abrǝham” / Yä-säbǝʿǝt sänbät ṣälot “The Liturgy of the Seventh Sabbath...” / Nägärä bä-ʾǝntä ʿaśärtu qalat “Story of the Ten Commandments”

shortcontents.shortcontent: I) Mäṣḥafä ʾardǝʾǝt “Book of the Disciples” (fols. 2r-34r) (cp. A.Z. AESCOLY, Recueil de Textes Falachas, Paris 1951, pp. 82-149) II) Miscellaneous hymns and prayers (fols. 34v-67v) III) Mäṣḥafä mälaʾǝkt “Book of the Angels” (fols. 67v-80r) IV) Sǝmʿu wä-lǝbbǝw ʾo-däqiqä ʾAdam “Listen and understand O children of Adam...” (fols. 80r-85v) V) Gädlä ʾAbrǝham “Vita of Abrǝham”, (fols. 85v-88r), incomplete VI) Yä-säbʿǝt sänbät ṣälot “The Liturgy of the Seventh Sabbath”, (fols. 88r-91v), incomplete (cp. M.Devens, The Liturgy of the Seventh Sabbath, Wiesbaden 1995, pp. 152-155) VII) Nägärä bä-ʾǝntä aśärtu qalat “Story of the Ten Commandments...” (fols. 91v-94r).

originlink.xlink:title: Soṭa Däbrä Sälam Qǝddus Mikaʾel / SDM

locationlink.xlink:title: Soṭa Däbrä Sälam Qǝddus Mikaʾel / SDM

owners.owner: Bälläṭä is mentioned in the supplication formulas (fols. 5r, 5v, 7v, 9r, 10r), as well as his father (ʾabuhu) Zägäyyä (fols. 6r, 82r, 89v). The Ms. is in private possession of märigeta Ḥawas ʾAbraha.

txstates.txstate: The front board is broken and repaired with two different threads. Fol. 1 has been enlarged by sewing a piece of parchment onto it. The ink is partly washed out on fols. 10v, 34r, 60r. Some fols. are stained with dirt on fols. 62v, 65r, 86v, 88v, 89r, 89v, 90r. The lower sewing station is broken on fol. 61r.

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards (the front board broken and repaired). Two pairs of sewing stations.

bnothers.bnother: Small holes are visible on the spine fold of the quires, close to the head and the tail of the codex.

squires.squire: A(1/fol. 1r-1v) – I(8/fols. 2r-9v) – II(8/fols. 10r-17v) – III(8/fols. 18r-25v) – IV(8/fols. 26r-33v) – V(7; s.l.: 2, stub after 6/fols. 34r-40v) – VI(8/fols.41r-48v) – VII(8/fols. 49r-56v) – VIII(8/fols. 57r-64v) – IX(8/fols. 65r-72v) – X(8/fols. 73r-80v) – XI(8/fols. 81r-88v) – XII(4; s.l.: 1, stub after 4; 2, stub after 4/fols. 89r-92v) – B(2/fols. 93r-94v).

taunit.rl-info: Ruling and pricking are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

pchangeofhands.pchangeofhand: The scribe often wrote a ligature between ግ and ዚ in words like እግዚአብሔር፡ or እግዚ, e.g. fols. 19v, 22r, 55v, 47r, 80r.

rubrications.rubrication: Nomina sacra; name of the owners; two groups of two lines alternating with black lines on the incipit page of Text I; one to three lines in the incipit of the subsections; the words qǝddus (fols. 55v-57r), hale luya (fol. 60r), täzkär (fol. 60v); elements of the punctuation signs; elements of Ethiopic numerals.

abbreviations.abbreviation: ፳ኤል for እስራኤል. ብ for ብሂል (fol. 3v). በኃ፡ ዝን፡ አስ for በኃይለ፡ ዝንቱ፡ አስማቲከ (fols. 5v, 6r, 7v, 8v, 27r, 27v, 28r, 49v). አድ፡ እግ፡ አም፡ በኃ፡ ዝን፡ አስ for አድኅነነ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ አምላክ፡ በኃይለ፡ ዝንቱ፡ አስማቲከ (fol. 7r, 8r, 9r). ስ፡ for ስምየ፡ (fol. 16v). እግ፡ አ፡ for እግዚአብሔር፡ አምላክ፡ (fols. 19v, 20r). ስ፡ ርድ፡ ወአ for ሰምከ፡ ርድአነ፡ ወአድህነኒ (fol. 30r). ለእግ for ለእግዚአብሔር፡ (fols. 35v, 36r). ይት፡ ስ፡ ለእ for ይትዓኰት፡ ሰሙ፡ ለእግዚአብሔር፡ (fol. 36v, 37r, 37v, 38r, 38v, 39r, 40r) ቅ for ቅዱስ (fols. 41v, 56r, 56v, 57r, 57v, 58r, 58v, 59r, 94r).

otherdetails.otherdetail:
Text I is the Beta ʾƎsraʾel version beginning with ይትባረክ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ አምላከ፡ እስራኤል; cp. A.Z. AESCOLY, Recueil de Textes Falachas, Paris 1951, pp. 82-149.
Text II includes the texts: - Canticle: ይትባረክ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ አምላከ፡ እስራኤል፡ ለኵሉ፡ ዘሥጋ፡ ወለኵሉ፡ መንፈስ፡... (fols. 34r-36r); cp. Aescoly 1951, pp. 152-154. - Hymn: ይትባረክ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ አምላከ፡ እስራኤል፡ ወእዜኑ፡ ጽድቀከ፡ በአፉየ፡ ለትውልደ፡ ትውልድ፡ እስከ፡ ለዓለም፡... (fols. 36r-37r); cp. Aescoly 1951, p. 156-157 - Psalm: ይትባረክ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ አምላከ፡ እስራኤል፡ ሊቃነ፡ መላእክት፡ ሚካኤል፡ ወገብርኤል፡ ሱራፌል፡ ወኪሩቤል፡... (fols. 37r-42v); cp. Aescoly 1951, pp. 158-169. - Protective prayer: ይትባረክ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ አምላከ፡ እስራኤል፡ ወዝንቱ፡ ውእቱ፡ ስማየ፡ ዘነገርክዎ፡... (fols. 42v-48r); cp. Aescoly 1951, pp. 176-185. - Incantation: ይትባረክ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ አምላከ፡ እስራኤል፡ ኤል፡ ኤል፡ ኤል፡ … ወእምብድብድ፡ ጽውዓ፡ ጽዋዕኩ፡... (fols. 48r-49v); cp. Aescoly 1951, p. 192-193. - ʾAsmat-prayer: ይትባረክ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ አምላከ፡ እስራኤል፡ ወጸውኡ፡ ስማየ፡ በሳብዕት፡ ዕለት፡...(fols. 49v-50v); cp. Aescoly 1951, p. 186-187. - Prayer: ወይእዜኒ፡ እግዚኦ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ አሜን፡ ቡሩክ፡... (fols. 50v-55v); cp. J. Halevy, Prieres des Falashas ou Juifs d’Abyssinie, Paris 1877, pp. 50-55. - Prayer: ይትባረክ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ አምላከ፡ እስራኤል፡ ዘገብረ፡ ዓቢየ፡ ወመንከረ ባሕቲቱ፡... (fols. 55v-60r); cp. Halevy 1877, p. 13ff. - Unidentified prayer: ተዘከር፡ እግዚአ፡ ኪዳነ፡ አብርሃም፡... (fols. 60r-67; cp. Halevy 1877, 40-42.

extras.extra: - Ṣägga ʾAmlak, one of the Beta ʾƎsraʾel forefathers is mentioned in the imbedded colophon on fol. 55v. - Erasure: fol. 60r. - Immediate corrections are marked with thin lines above and below letters or words: fols. 15r, 28v, 34v, 48v, 89r, 90v, 91r. - Omitted word written interlineally: fols. 33r, 45r, 68r, 80. - Crude notes and scribbles: fols. 1r, 1v, 94v.
